lead_paragraph: A former union hall that was transformed into a studio/residence/oasis for the artist Jennifer Bartlett is poised to enter the market.

headline.main: Clinton Hill Home Designed for an Artist: $8.5 Million

snippet: A former union hall that was transformed into a studio/residence/oasis for the artist Jennifer Bartlett is poised to enter the market.
abstract: Renovated former union hall on border of Brooklyn's Clinton Hill and Fort Greene neighborhoods, turned into a studio, home retreat and gallery by artist Jennifer Bartlett, will enter market at asking price of $8.5 million.
